attributes.action: Ban animal abusers from ever having pets for life and not just a few years
attributes.background: Just recently I have been coming across more and more videos / pics / stories of people punching kicking and torturing innocent animals /pets for fun I want the government to come down hard on those who carry out these sick acts by banning these people from having pets for life and tougher fines

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Under the Animal Welfare Act 2006 a person can already be prevented from owning or keeping animals if they are convicted: 

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2006/45/section/34
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
